archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 300 video reels: sd; col. & b & w; 1 in.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site. Users must request boxes 48 hours in advance of desired use. Neither drop-in nor next-day requests can be fulfilled. For additional information, contact Special Collections.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jefferson Cable Videotapes, Accession #11458, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains ca. 3000 reel-to-reel videotapes of programs produced by Jefferson Cable, ca. 1969-1985.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The 298 videotapes have been listed in the sequence received and assigned a sequential "Tape #" (column 1). However, it was apparent that the tapes are not in proper sequence by any category.
Note: some containers are marked "H.E." or "Not H.E." That evidently stands for "(NOT) High Energy." Not being program identification, the information is not recorded below.

Note: Boxes / tapes that were labeled with more than one program were given a separate record for each title. But in some instances, tapes may have been re-used without the title of the original program being deleted.
Note: The collection includes one 16mm motion picture of "Chalk Talk" which is filed in the motion picture collection.
